definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Today's vegetarian generations may frown upon canned luncheon meat.
sentences.chinese: 如今素食的一代人是不喜欢罐装的午餐肉的。

sentences.english: There are also a few foods that I personally steer away from, like lunch meat.
sentences.chinese: 当然也有一些是我个人敬而远之的，比如午餐肉。

sentences.english: Add chicken stock and bring to a simmer.
sentences.chinese: 然后加入午餐肉和鸡汤慢炖。

sentences.english: Alison picked a winner with the luncheon meat and egg soup.
sentences.chinese: Alison选对了，带午餐肉和鸡蛋的汤面。

sentences.english: The boy's parents must find luncheon meat he obtains this way particularly tasty.
sentences.chinese: 对于这一家人，这样得来的午餐肉，吃来更甘香可口。

definition: tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
